metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20763 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GPAC 0.7.1 and earlier, gf_text_get_utf8_line in media_tools/text_import.c in libgpac_static.a allows an out-of-bounds write because of missing szLineConv bounds checking. It was discovered that the GPAC MP4Box utility incorrectly handled certain memory operations. If an user or automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted MP4 file, a remote attacker could use this issue to cause MP4Box to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
